detail_desc: Fabric trainers with concealed elastication at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Wide blouse in a cotton weave with inset lace trims and a round neckline. Opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck, a yoke with pin-tucks front and back, and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Glittery jumpsuit in an airy weave with a V-neck front and back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the front, a narrow elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and straight, ankle-length legs. Lined.
